column5: Hey all,  Just thought I would drop by and say hello. Ive been roaming these forums for a bit now and thought id finally come out of the shadows. I love looking at all the pictures/stories you guys have shared from your fishing adventures, and I thought id share a few of mine as well from this summer. This is my first year of serious fishing, so Im still learning a lot about the sport, but having a lot of fun doing it. I am from Mississauga, so most of my fishing is usually in Brampton - Orangeville, and Milton - London. Here are some of the bass Ive caught within the last couple months. Will definitely enjoy getting to know everyone here and hopefully we can do some fishing together soon! Cheers.            Some of the larger bass ive caught this year.  4.5lber   5lber.   And the best for last. My PB for the year so far: 6.5lbs.   Cheers!
some nice buckets dude...welcome to the board

Welcome aboard, Cypher...that intro got better and better!!  Just wondering if you still use those white cottony-looking gloves when handling the fish..?  Being very friendly here, so don't take it the wrong way, but I'm thinkin' that they're bad for the fish, unless they're some kind of special fishing glove.  From here they look like a basic gardening/work glove that would be rough on fish slime and not very good for anything you're letting go. Looking forward to seeing more bass-tastic posts from you, Cypher

IF that bass is one you caught this year you got the 2nd biggest on OFC at the moment then for largemouths lol. That is unless I have missed a biggin, 6lbs 13oz is in the top spot with a 5lb 7oz largie in 3rd(I'm in first  )  Great  intro and welcome to OFC bra, MTBF

Hi Johnny,  Yea as I mentioned, this was my first year of fishing, and these pictures are somewhat in chronological order as well. I did use gloves for the first portion of my trips, but once I got used to holding them, I stopped using them, as you see from the last couple pictures. haha. Thanks for the welcome!
Hi Mike,  Yes that bass was caught last week actually. haha. Thanks for the welcome!
I know cypher and this IS REALLY his first year of fishing. I can't believe he got that 6.5 lber...this guy learns fast. Good work bro.

Welcome to OFC Cypher Great first year and some nice looking bass Congrats on your PB!!! What a hawg That one's going to be a tough one to beat eh Thanks for sharing and looking forward to reading your future reports Leechman
Awesome pics & welcome to the forum.....All I can say is "I'm jealous" & I'm not showing these pics to my fishin' buddy.....She'll be equally as jealous lol.....Nice catches
